website_summaries.verdict: A hemp-based pain relief cream that's effective but pricey.
pros: Hemp extract works well to relieve inflammation and is highly effective on skin conditions
It also supports the body’s natural healing processes making it excellent on rashes and bruises
cons: Some users may need to apply extra to feel effects and will go through the tub quickly

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in 1 use!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail and 10-15 mins after application the pain in my back was relieved. It's not completely gone, but I can function. I have 2 ruptured discs,1 herniated disc, arthritis, sciatica, and no cartilage in between the vertebrae in the lower half of my back. So I had no expectations of this product to completely relieve all my aches and pains. But I certainly feel a major difference.
customer_reviews.author: EA1026

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 rotator cuff surgeries on my shoulder and this cream really helps with pain relief instead of using Advil or Tylenol. I can finally get a good nights sleep when I put this on before going to bed. It also works great throughout the day to alleviate the pain. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It Really Worked For Me!
customer_reviews.text: My right shoulder has a torn rotator cuff and a separated shoulder which wakes me up 4 or more times a night. Last night just before going to bed, I rubbed some HEMPACTIV Hemp Pain Relief Cream on my shoulder. I slept through the night for the first time in several years. I know this sounds made up but it is true!
customer_reviews.author: G. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Effective Relieve from Pain & Swelling
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique combination of three pain and inflammation relief products normally not combined; i.e. CBD, menthol & Annuus Oil. Each have their own way of working.. together you have a powerful relief effort! I have arthritis, and often tear ligaments while working... this provided almost instant relief from pain.
customer_reviews.author: Bart in FL

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: It is relieving shoulder pain that my husband has been enduring for months. He had relief with first application and hasn’t had to take painkillers. I used it today on my arthritic knees , easing pain and helping me move easier.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryLover

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again if Amazon gets more
customer_reviews.text: I have a neurological disease and symptoms are horrible. This cream gave me a bit of relief and for me that is worth everything.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I’m in the minority here but this product did absolutely nothing for any of my pain—not neck, not knee, not low back. I was expecting so much from the 750 mg of hemp and other ingredients like arnica and MSM that my go-to pain reliever does not contain. I can highly recommend Penetrex which is also available on Amazon. When I apply it, pain disappears quickly and pain relief lasts a long time. If anyone has another topical pain reliever recommendation, I would love to hear about it. One good thing about Hemp Activ is that it offers a 100% money-back guarantee which I will be claiming.
customer_reviews.author: Shanehill

customer_reviews.title: Best ever pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I love how with in 15 minutes of using this cream the arthritis pain in my fingers is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Naylor

customer_reviews.title: NO CBD OIL.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not contain CBD oil. An Amazon search for CBD for pain, directed me to all these hemp products, NONE of which contains CBD. Very misleading and painful.
customer_reviews.author: PERRY

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well for several people
customer_reviews.text: It has helped me greatly reduce the amount of Advil I take for my back pain issues. Gave samples to several people who were having pain issues and all reported great results for what they were experiencing. My brother-in-law was having an inflamed tender elbow and couldn't put any weight or pressure on it, gave him some to rub on and the next morning he was putting weight on the elbow without pain. Said he was going to order some.
customer_reviews.author: E Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. My husband tried it for his back pain. He Did not feel any relief at all. I used it for my neck pain. I did not feel any relief at all. I would give this a 0 rating if that was an option. Very expensive. We should have just used Icy Hot! We do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: H. B.

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERED DAMAGED!!
customer_reviews.text: Came open and a mess. For the money, I thought it would at least be packaged securely. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of the ingredients advertised. As you can see and compare to what is advertised in the photos on the Amazon page, they are not the same. I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: NNM

customer_reviews.title: Pain Free (almost)
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell and took a tumble.. she has a compressed fracture of the spine and lumbar strain (hard to bend over just dress herself). I heard of this product from a friend of mine.. he swears by its effect to relive pain. I decided to purchase it (I don't like to see my wife in pain) and in less than 30 minutes she could feel relief from pain in her lumbar and able to somewhat be her "normal" self. As I'm writing this she walked into my home office singing.. WOW!! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Hempactiv cream
customer_reviews.text: Hempactiv cream did not do a thing for me. I've requested my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Jean Milot

customer_reviews.title: No relief for me❗️
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately your product doesn’t work at all. I gave it a chance—seven days of use & got absolutely no relief! I would like to get a refund. I believe you have a satisfaction guarantee. Please inform me what to do.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on soreness, smells as if it has too much menthol in it...smells like Vick's.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I was a competitive tennis player when I was younger, and now it just hurts to play, but it's still worth it. Depending on the day it's tennis elbow, back pain, shoulder pain, or knee pain. I just can't get out there as much as I want. So, I got this hemp cream, and it's AMAZING. I feel great after using it - I recover faster than before. Do yourself a favor and give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe lower back pain & arthritis in my hands. Hempactiv really helps reduce the pain and inflammation. Will continue to use instead of ibuprofen.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer anthony

customer_reviews.title: It Works, Period.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care if some say it’s a placebo, if it works and it’s all in my head that’s still 100000% better than other options simply not working at all. ..but, lemme just say, it is NOT placebo. Spinal stenosis C3/4, constant aches and pains, few mins after applying I get ~8 hrs of relief, every time. Already ordering a refill. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carosella

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: Made me feel cold and uncomfortable. Did not relieve my pain. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous

customer_reviews.title: Works so far for my tennis elbow pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a few days now, twice a day for my tennis elbow pain. So far it’s been helping a lot. It gives off a warm tingly feeling and sort of numbs the area you put it on. Doesn’t smell awful either like bengay does. I’ll be using this for my aches and pains from now on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: I'm a seriously happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have had fibromyalgia and arthritis (one or both of which cause muscle spasms) for over 10 years. During that time, I have spent a LOT of money and time on many different "sure-fire" remedies that did me absolutely no good. I am delighted to say that this one actually works! Rubbing it in according to the instructions brings my pain and muscle spasms down to a manageable level.
customer_reviews.author: Scootersaurus

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from sometimes intense nearly unbearable muscular pain in my shoulder, neck and upper arm. I've tried several other remedies that provided a small measure of relief. I slathered this product on my skin over where the pain was the worst and it provided nearly instant relief. My only complaint was that it didn't seem to penetrate deep enough relief. Then I read the instructions: "Thoroughly massage cream onto affected area ..." When I followed the instructions I found it provided relief deep into muscles,
customer_reviews.author: steveszat

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as expected however I will not purchase again. Too pricey for a small tub. I would rather pay less for arnica cream and some peppermint oil and get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Updated...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fairly quickly. Light scent that isn't too bad. Update: The first 2 or 3 days it seemed to work... but now I have used for 2 weeks and have not noticed any improvement. I'm bummed, but I will continue to use until I run out of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works on Disc Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have bulged and herniated discs in my neck and back. I will eventually have to have surgery on both. I am currently scheduled for an MRI and will see a surgeon in about a month. Meanwhile, my neck feels like someone is placing their hand on the back of my next and putting pressure there. Then I have nausea. My lower back prevents me from standing in one position for any length of time. This cream helps both-not completely, but it helps. The pressure on the neck is still their because the disc is sliding to one side, but the nausea is gone. I tried Voltaren, but this product works better.
customer_reviews.author: Chip's picks

customer_reviews.title: No Effect
customer_reviews.text: I've applied this cream to my knee religiously 3X per day since I received and my knee feels no different. I'm 47 and have early onset arthritis in my knee, so says my orthopedic surgeon. Usually I get a steroid shot every September (I'm a football official) but I thought I would try this cream first. This cream gives the cool burning sensation like Icy Hot, but other than that, no other relief or solution of pain. I may try the more expensive CBD balms that you can buy from a store, but in my opinion this cream is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Ben-gay, burns like Ben-gay.  This might just be Ben-Gay.
customer_reviews.text: Wash your hands, and wash your hands again. Then wash them one more time, because you don't want to get this stuff anywhere you would not want to get Ben-gay. Trust me. I notice no difference whatsoever between this product and when I use plain old Ben-Gay. I chose this product because of the 2,000,000 on the listing thinking that was the amount of hemp/cbd concentration in the product. But that 2,000,000 sticker is missing from the jar I got, so I have no idea of really how much CBD is in the cream. There is also a sticker over the previous barcode, and the sticker says "New Item." Seems like a bait and switch to me.
customer_reviews.author: kdm

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well; haven't used it long but so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and am very happy. I have some sciatica pain which is tolerable but annoying. When I applied this product, the pain went away. I've done this twice now. Not sure if this will work long-term but I will leave more feedback later. I do want to mention that there is definitely an immediate odor from the menthol but that goes away quickly. It also applies easily - not thick and gooey - doesn't stick to your hands, washes off quickly and seems to be absorbed into the skin right away. I haven't used other products so I can't compare. Just happy with this right now.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Used cream bottle
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get to use the cream because I received it yesterday and when I opened it....it looked half empty. Cream bottle wasn’t full and it looked like someone used it before. I’m not sure if it works or not but it does smell okay. I am going to return this product. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Edrick

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T RELIEVE PAIN AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS EXPENSIVE PRODUCT BECAUSE OF THE GREAT REVIEWS. I TRIED IT ON MY KNEE, THIGH AND BACK. IT DID NOT WORK. I AM SEVERLY DISAPPOINTED. I WASTED MY MONEY FOR NOTHING. I AM USUALLY VERY HAPPY WITH THE THINGS I BUY FROM AMAZON BUT THIS WAS CRAP
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this product for one week and already have seen a big improvement. She had pain on the right side side of her back just below her waist. She does Zumba 3x a week and perhaps it originated from that. This is first time she has had this pain after about 5 years of Zumba 3x per week. She cannot use Ibuprofen so this product has been a great find for her and her pain is about about 75% gone after this short time. She calls it her miracle cream and has already recommended it to 4 others in her Zumba class.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is really good1
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hempactiv. It really relieves the pain in my knees and keeps the pain free for many hours. The only drawback is the scent, which is really overpowering. However, it dissipates rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Snap

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for about three weeks for a sore ankle that felt sprained. Sore Archilles tendon and instep. Tried another product with no success. Liked the menthol smell - that’s about it. Another item, there was a bubble in the cream that caused the volume to drop 25%! Doesn’t help with the high cost but to be fair, they do offer to sent a free jar which does cut that in half.
customer_reviews.author: MrEd

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise...this is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’ll be honest...been having foot pains since i was pregnant and now that I have my newborn all the stress and pain goes to my feet! I’ve tried literally everything mineral ice..bengay...you name it. Foot baths foot massage machines. Nothing worked. I bought this and when I received it I thought it smelled like bengay and thought I got fooled into buying this product. I rubbed it on my foot and omg first time I slept in months with no pain and the next day I was sweeping and mopping doing laundry I never felt better! Amazing I still am in shock. My husband is thankful that I don’t have to bother him for foot massages anymore
customer_reviews.author: Liavue

customer_reviews.title: Strains strains go away!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and liked the price. I was skeptical. I had a calf strain and after 2 doses it was healed. My wife had a calf strain a couple weeks later. She used it a couple times and again problem gone. I also have various joint issues with being a truck delivery driver. This definitely has helped there as well. So far muscle issues are fixed and joint issues are improving. Definitely recommend. I tried other expensive stuff and received little to no help. Ordering more now!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: product effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product highly. I felt relief from my back pain a few minutes after my first application of the product. I apply to the pain area 3 times a day as recommended. I've been using this for 2 weeks now & it is still an effective pain relief. I have used other CBD cream but this is the only one that is effective for me. I 'll keep buying & using this cream. Before I found this product I could not walk 2 blocks without pain, now I can walk, sit, use the stairs etc. painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Luh

customer_reviews.title: Something everyone needs to try once
customer_reviews.text: After years of playing many sports and now being only 39 years old with constant and aching shoulder pain, a hip that as the doctor put it will need to be replaced soon and a lower back that hurts everyday. I have to say this product within the first 2 days has made my life a lot easier. I have better range of motion, I can sit for low periods of time without pain, and my hip doesn't feel like it's from an 80 year old man. Love this product so much.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pain in my wrist, which was broken a couple years ago, and this winter was causing it to ache all the time. While it did not take the pain away, it did considerably lessen the aching (from an irritation factor of 9 to like a 3). The effect lasted for about 3 hours after applying. I did find it a bit greasy, which is why it is rated 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: brutallyhonest

customer_reviews.title: Natural pain relief cream that works.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have a broken hand and tennis elbow, I tried this cream because of the natural ingredients and the positive reviews and as of now using it for two days it is living up to the good reviews. It has helped relieve my pain fairly quickly while also lasting a good bit of the day. I only wish you got more of it for the price you pay. Update... I started using this stuff for pain I have in my lymph nodes, and it’s working nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Sparko

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to work...oh well.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Not on my rotator cuff pain, muscle pain, or arthritis pain. Really disappointed. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Vinny from New Haven

customer_reviews.title: Fast pain relief , long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This product is a no- nonsense item. Worth every penny. Application is easy and it smells great. The scent dissipates in a few minutes. It relieved the tendonitis in both my arms. It is anti-inflammatory, which means it really speeds up the healing process. Much better than those fake tv products. I was very dissatisfied about another product that I bought the same time with this (essential oils), but this gives me cause to believe that there are still good folks in our markets. I would give you six stars if space permitted. This veteran thanks you for taking away the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Miles G

customer_reviews.title: Better choices for lower price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this cream would be great after reading the reviews. It has a strong smell and does not provide much pain relief.....you are lucky to be pain free for an hour after applying. After that, it does nothing. There was also a sticker on the jar for a free bottle. I was going to give my Mother the jar and see if it provided her any relief. I contacted them and never received it. I won't buy from a company who tries to lure people in like that and not hold up to their promise. Besides, the cream isn't that great. I found another brand on here that is more potent and you get twice the size jar.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Tackett

customer_reviews.title: It takes the edge off my pain!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this product. I have really bad back pain and I can’t walk to the kitchen (10’ away) with out the pain getting bad. It doesn’t last a really long time (about 20-30 minutes but that is time enough for my pain medication to start working. It doesn’t take away all the pain but takes the edge off. It’s the only product that has worked for me. At bed time it eases the muscles enough for me to get somewhat comfortable so I can let my melatonin start working! I’m so happy I found this product. For me it helps!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product it has given me back the quality of my life
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this amazing product I’ve been suffering from severe hip pain for over a month ,I tried different salves and took countless Advil just to be able to function to a degree. My Sister in law told me about this hemp cream and how it has helped with her knee pain Yesterday it was delivered and even after the first application there was some relief of the pain This morning applied again and I actually had a good day at work the first in a Long Time Now it is to the point of the pain being almost completely gone. I feel like a new person
customer_reviews.author: ursula dozier

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a month now. It lasts me about 4 hours, I have degenerative disc disease affecting my neck and lower back. I also am afflicted with plantar fascitis so I am using on my feet. Many of the CBD creams I researched had far less milligrams of actual CBD oil and some didn't even disclose the level. I read the reviews before buying and am happy to add mine to the list of 5 star reviewers. I have purchased this for my brother-in-law, and my boss. Both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain free at last
customer_reviews.text: Received my first jar today and am greatly surprised...I can walk normal for the first time in years....with a bone on bone knee the pain can take over your like...I've tried a number of creams, roll ons, and I have used this HEMPACTIV for the first time and I am totally sold....Thank You for a bit heaven
customer_reviews.author: wheezie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to relive arthritic pain in both hands....It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical purchasing this, but thought what the hey, and did. I have arthritis in both hands and it was difficult to try to play golf again and teach my son to play. Have used now for three days, twice daily, and it has made a noticeable difference in the pain. Going to try it on Sciatica next.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have an injured shoulder and I would normally get injections and use Diclofenac gel and ibuprofen 800mg for pain. I feel like I’ve tried everything from chiropractic work, PT, CBD gummies and oil, muscle relaxers and OTC pain gels/creams. Pros: Does relieve a lot of the pain Works quickly Fairly well priced Quick delivery Cons: Don’t prefer the menthol feeling on skin or the menthol scent (it’s not terrible it’s just pungent) Doesn’t last as long as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.author: cherryface

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how well this would work, but both my wife and I have used it now. It has helped her severely arthritic knees a great deal, and I use it for a sore shoulder and arthritic thumb. I was also very pleased the value compared to a couple of other CBD products we've used, which seem VERY expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Cream for pain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and tried for back and hip pain. Did not work. The same thing does not help everyone. If it works for you use it and be happy with product. The smell was fine. Just menthol and applied well. Just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It has been 1 week. I received this on a Saturday and used it as directed a couple of times/day for ankle arthritis. By Wednesday is no longer needed my brace and Th and F I only used it in the am. No stiffness, no limping, no pain, and increased range or motion. I went to ortho a couple weeks ago and was told ankle fusion or replacement was the only solution for pain relief. I decided to search amazon for arthritis pain relief and found this will close to 5,000 positive reviews and thought I’d give it a try. Best $ ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: christina crosby

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I purchased this as a last ditch effort to an ongoing chronic tendon/muscle issue in my knee. I work in a setting that requires long periods of time on my feet on concrete lined floors. I use this nightly and I will say it's definitely helping. Within a couple of days my knee felt better than with any other treatment I had been using. It's pricey but, you use it rather sparingly. A little goes a long way and it's worth it to not be in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: No more pain medicine for me!
customer_reviews.text: After back surgery, I had difficulty tolerating the anti-inflammatories and pain medication prescribed to me. A physician friend suggested I try HempActiv. I was floored by how much it helped me get through my postop pain and months long physical therapy. Now my husband and I both use it for sore muscles, aches and pains, and even headaches. My elderly parents are both using it for knee pain and finally have something for pain relief that doesn’t pose a risk to the kidneys. Thanks, HempActiv for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: ATxQT

customer_reviews.title: good product, moderate pain relief, menthol is too strong, sometimes adds discomfort
customer_reviews.text: the product is good, i can sleep through the night but at first when applied it is a little uneasy, adding a little bit of discomfort, i cannot itch anywhere near my face as it will add discomfort from the menthol. once you get through the first 15 minutes of application, youre good to go and the pain is relieved. I use it for my carpal tunnel and it wakes me up through the night, disrupting my sleep, works great. i would recommend if u dont mind the icy feeling and the minty smell which can sometimes be overwhelming. thats just me.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my mother to try she has DJD and has a lot of problems with pain in her hands and her arms. She has tried many OTC creams with no relief so I figured I would give this cream a try. It is not taking all the pain away but it is helping, she is finally able to relax and sleep before the pain was keeping her up. She said she wanted to keep using this cream so I know it’s helping more than any of the other ones she has tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tarasnow

customer_reviews.title: maybe works, maybe doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his bad back. He THINKS it works, but isn't sure. However, he does ask me to rub it on his back, but that could be because we don't want to waste the money. That's why I gave it 3 stars. Maybe it helps others and not us. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Relief😍
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many hemp creams. Some worked well but this one is the Bomb! I used this today and it was immediate relief. I’m staying with the Activ Hemp Cream. I really do know what’s I’m talking about. I’m so happy because I can go to sleep tonight. Thank you, Activ. I’m giving it 5 Stars because it works not for anything else. I have a shoulder injury that has plagued me for months. When to my hemp cream I had been using for my legs. Didn’t help. When to Cryo Care 3 times and nothing. First time I tried Activ cream Wow.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Fast working pain reliever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about 8 months ago. Put it away and forgot I had it. I am so glad I cleaned out my linen closet. I found it and what a difference it makes. I have horrible osteo arthritis in all of my lower joints. Activ hemp relief cream is the only thing I have ever found that works! Almost totally pain free. 7 years of searching finally paid off. It truly is almost instant relief and for all day’
customer_reviews.author: DIANA CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Relief in a few minutes after application!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product from the first. For me, it worked within the first few minutes after application to my bone on bone knee. I had been having some success with a couple of other hemp products, but thought I might see if a stronger one might help more. After reading many reviews, I decided to try Hemp Activ 120000 mg extra strength product. I find that this product, as others, work best when used alone & not mixed with another brand. I will definitely be ordering more hemp activ.
customer_reviews.author: GA Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had ongoing pain with joints and muscles for a long time from working out, injuries, etc, and don’t like to take over the counter pain products due to negative side affects. When I heard about this product my thinking was, what have I got to lose? I wish I would’ve tried this a long time ago. This product works great and the effects are pretty quick. Rotater, muscle ache, knee pain, tennis elbow, it seems to reduce or eliminate pain for everything I’ve tried it on so far. When I bought this I also sent 1 to my 85 y/o mom who’s been a long time fibromyalgia sufferer. She is also very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carpio

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: For me this creamed numbed the throbbing for about 10-15 minutes but that's all so I was bummed. I now mix it with my bio-freeze, which doesn't help one way or the other but since it was so expensive I feel obligated to use it all (especially since I ordered 2 of these to treat myself with it being Christmas and all)....waaaah! :(
customer_reviews.author: LilTexasRose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen so many products such as this with great reviews but they did nothing for my pain. This product works!!!! I have told so many people about it and all have purchased a jar. I primarily use it on my wrist for carpal tunnel, it work wonders as I am on the computer all day. I also crochet almost daily and braid hair occasionally. I have used it on my lower pain and knee pain. Best product of any kind that I had purchased in a while. I am very happy with it and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Having arthritis over the years, along with various other pains and surgeries due to horses and other activities, I have tried numerous products. I have several different products currently, but when I receive this one I was very pleased to find that when rubbed on my hands I almost immediately felt relief from my arthritis. The scent is light, and I would give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hoar

customer_reviews.title: Pain... is soften...Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many different hemp products over the last few years. By far this is the best yet. I was able to sleep 5 to 6 hours straight. Unheard of for me. I am 67 deal with chronic pain due to a spinal disease. My nerve damage is so painful in my hands, shoulders feet and hip. Using very little of this topical I was in tears with the relief it was providing. I don't usually post many reviews unless I feel it would benefit others.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Watson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out if you’re sensitive, menthol sends icy shocks to joints!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the jury is out on this one! I used this on my hands and was in more pain QUICKLY. It was like the menthol sent shocks of ice into my hand joints (I have psoriatic arthritis, fibromyalgia and degenerative disc disease, so I tested it out on my hands). My hands hurt for almost 24 hours after I use this, I’ve been afraid to use it since.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Gross

customer_reviews.title: This product did not help at all.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked for my sciatica and muscle pain. I used it 4 times a day, for 3 days but nothing seemed to change.
customer_reviews.author: sandra m. arseth

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 yrs old and about 6 months ago started to develop arthritis in my knee and hip. I was running and on eliptical 4-5 days per week. Had to stop because of lingering pain. Dr prescribed meds, didn't work. Tried other creams and got some relief. Since using hempactiv the pain has been almost nonexistent. Not fully gone but I can again regularly exercise without lingering pain. I'll never be able to run again but extremely happy with results and will ordered regularly. I use it 2-3 xs per day.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: It's a fair product, and may be of help to some.  Not too strong IMHO
customer_reviews.text: In my humble opinion, this product is OK, but not quite the strength that I thought it would be. Even when I first opened my pores on my lower back / shoulder with Absorbine Jr. Which really helps this work a lot better, it was just not quite enough for me to relax those muscles and help with pain management. May be great for others and be perfect. Better than Blue Emu, I can vouch for that.
customer_reviews.author: Leland W. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Review of product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this cream for a few days and got no relief
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: My jar came only 1/2 filled!
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty good. Most CBD creams don’t have anything in it to give you that cooling feeling. This 1 does. My only gripe is my container came about 1/2 full. When I opened it it looked full to the top but there was actually a big air pocket/void and that took up about 1/2 the jar🤷🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Kevin s Takatsuka

customer_reviews.title: Offers better pain relief in comparison to other products like it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he and I have both used it, he had ruptured a disc in his back that we are always trying new products on and I have a nerve impingement in my neck. This cream has already offered great pain relief for both of us and I think it will help greatly in going about our busy professions (mechanic and nurse). Excited to find a product that works. The only reason I didn’t give it a higher score with scent is that does use menthol and therefore has a pretty strong menthol cent which doesn’t bother me at home but I don’t know that I would wear when going to work.
customer_reviews.author: emmy

customer_reviews.title: Much better than creams from the store.
customer_reviews.text: Good pain relief without the Hemp smell. Has a nice light menthol smell. I tried another Hemp cream that works about the same but it smelled like I would alert any passing drug dog. The pain relief from this cream is noticeable. Works very well for sore muscles. It didn't work as well for my sprained ankle, but still better than store bought creams.
customer_reviews.author: frankl5150

customer_reviews.title: Helped my neck
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other hemp analgesic creams and this seems to work the best, although it is a lot more expensive per ounce then some of the others. The free jar for first time users cuts the initial price in half for the first couple bottles. The benefits last about 3 to 4 hours. I use it on my arthritic neck and can be used in lieu of oral pain medications.
customer_reviews.author: bdh503

customer_reviews.title: Works with plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I used this cream for plantar fasciitis, and so far has work great and better than other products I have used. I even sprayed lidocaine on the painful arch area which only suppressed the pain for 15 minutes. This product however works as expected as long as you follow the instructions. In my case, I used it 3x a day and massaged the area until the cream was well absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Erika V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE skeptic when it comes to CBD. Maybe I should say was. This works great, is a good pain reliever and though you can smell the menthol, the smell fades fairly rapidly. This is the first cream I have tried, and am interested in the forms that have arnica and msm, but for the price, I have no complaints. I’ve ordered it twice and will again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen2K

customer_reviews.title: HempActiv
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me jar with a few days worth of cream to try. I instantly felt it going to work. It was so good that I ordered a jar of my own. I recently had shingles, and nothing worked, not even the prescription meds. After the shingles healed the pain remained, that left me with PHN, which is a pain that my doctor says could last a month, a year or longer, Since starting on Hemp Activ my pain is very manageable.,......So I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: This really helps with my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my shoulder on 8/30/19, and my opinion is that the surgery was not a success; if any of you have ever had shoulder surgery you know how painful it is and how long the recovery can be. Here it is a year later and some nights it feels like I have a knife in my shoulder. Hemp Activ is a life-saver, it really helps manage the pain! Thank you HempActiv!
customer_reviews.author: Hyannisgal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cream!
customer_reviews.text: I have spinal stenosis, back pain and sciatic pain which radiates down into my hip. Before I received this cream, I was in terrible pain, was only getting about 3-4 hours of sleep per night, taking way too much NSAIDs (ibuprofen, etc.) and could not walk without a limp. I received the cream and was amazed at how much it helped relieve my pain the first time I applied it. I am please to say that I slept 7 hours the first night, reapplied again in the morning and was able to walk almost without a limp. The pain is not entirely gone but it is a pain that I can live with, without having to take any pain meds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality, texture and pain relief. I have arthritis, fibromyalgia, spinal stenosis, deg disc and Oste all in my lower back not to mention I broke my back 8 hour surgery and have 7 pins in my spine.
customer_reviews.author: stormy Daze

customer_reviews.title: Works well short term.
customer_reviews.text: Got for dad for bad arthritis pain. He claims it seems to have made it worse. After he doesn't use it. He doesn't have the ability to be reapplying every few hours at his job so is good for some, but not all.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Druckenmiller

customer_reviews.title: This sucks try a different one
customer_reviews.text: Tried this cbd cream because it was supposed to be stronger,but I'm disappointed this cream sucks....I would buy some else. Don't get ripped off like I did
customer_reviews.author: scott bechel

customer_reviews.title: Sold my phone number
customer_reviews.text: First: tiger balm works better. Second: unsolicited text messages for CBD products. Do not buy if you do not want your phone number sold (the one part of your shipping address). I use a specific number for Amazon orders for this very reason.
customer_reviews.author: matthew johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, low smell, with menthol feeling
customer_reviews.text: I am a 1/2 marathon runner. I love using this stuff after a training session or a race. Smell isn’t super powerful so I do t walk around smelling like menthol. But it has that warm tingling menthol feeling with an added kick of pain reducer. I especially notice it after the 2nd application. I apply once and it’s lovely then reapply about and hour or so later. Just before bed. I usually run and apply at night. Sometimes before work, if I find I’m sore in the am. Works fabulously!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in combination with a multi-ingredient compounded prescription product for arthritis in my feet. Neither product works as well as the use of both together. I use HEMPACTIV on the bottom of my feet and the compounded prescription on the top of my feet. I have tried numerous brands of hemp and marijuana (cbd, thc) based topical products and have found HEMPACTIV to be the most effective for me.
customer_reviews.author: M Scalzi

customer_reviews.title: Have tried so many
customer_reviews.text: I have DJD and have had 3 total hip replacements and will be having my knees replaced as well. I have tried so many CDC/Hemp products and none really do the job as promised. I decided to try one more and I am so grateful I did. Activ has been amazing. I have only been using it for three days and can already tell a difference. The smell is a little strong at first, however it is still a pleasant smell. I will be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of these creams and none provided relief but this one worked. It took about 2 days using it twice a day to notice a difference, but if I forget to put this one my hip and knee starts bothering me. It has a slight smell but doesn't last long. The relief lasts most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: JTD19971

customer_reviews.title: Describe Product As Shown On Product Container
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that was kind of OK !! is that it warmed the area up,, yet never really got to joints as it did the muscle.. Sorry!! We're really disappointed with the product, for it's been over sold !! No Where does it say it has 2000mg Hemp Oil & it's not listed till the 5th Ingredient,,, The Ingredients needs to be shown as it is on the Container !! We're using the ,,, "Incredible Mister C's COMFORT SALVE" ,,, it has the same relief as the "ACTIV Hemp Relief cream" except it warmer & the COMFORT SALVE is 50% cheaper !!
customer_reviews.author: Ed & Lovy

customer_reviews.title: This is the only product to reduce my arthritis pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have bilateral hip osteoarthritis. I've had it since 2010. My groin areas and my knees have a lot of pain and stiffness after walking for a few minutes with 2 crutches. I've tried products such as ArnitRx and Penetrex and nothing helped until I rubbed on Hempactive tonight. I was walking fine with just one forearm crutch a few minutes after rubbing on the product! This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: DemosL

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT!!! ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! A few hours minimum! Had my husband use it for hip bursitis—it provided relief as well which no doctor around the city could manage! So well that I am purchasing a container as a Christmas gift to my sister, who struggles with joint pain as a cocktail waitress! Highly recommend—worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: silly*island*housecat

customer_reviews.title: lateral epicondylitis relief
customer_reviews.text: I used the product last night after I received it in mail. First time in several weeks I was able to sleep through the night without awakening to severe burning, deep aching pain in my elbow. There continues to be a mild, deep pain with range of motion if I really try to elicit pain, but I have only been using one day, so I am very impressed so far. I have been able to focus on my work today and not my painful elbow. Thank you for a great, reasonably priced product!
customer_reviews.author: nk

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me daughter but decided to try it myself before I gave it to her. It worked even better than I had expected. I have used it at night before I go to bed as often my back pain keeps me from dropping off to sleep. I have found as I used it that the pain has greatly lessened and I am able to sleep. Going to have to buy another bottle for both myself and my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help, too much Menthol
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands that gave some relief to tennis elbow, this one gave no relief. Seems like the main ingredient is Menthol. The smell is really powerful. Not worth the money and have had better results with other products.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am liking this product. I fractured my humeral bone and have bone marrow edema, cyst and internal hemorrhage, some osteoarthritis, tendonitis and bursitis from a single injury. Go big or go home I guess. The menthol in this product is very soothing for me. Yes it smells like menthol, but it is not so overpowering your eyes water like in some products. I'll buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: First Day of being Pain-Free in Months!
customer_reviews.text: I have had pain in my left elbow for over a year, and pain in my right hand started a couple months ago. The morning after putting this cream on both locations, I awoke pain-free... I was absolutely amazed! I didn't apply it the next night just to see if it was a fluke, and sure enough the pain was back. I applied it after I woke up, and the pain disappeared again! I have already recommended this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised as to how well it worked! Loving this
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I was hesitant to give it a try but after suffering from heat cramps I still had some lingering soreness that nothing truly soothed until I put this on, especially on my back. It does have a tingling/warming sensation when first applied but it does fade and relief remains. I put this on certain areas before bed and it lasts all night and surprisingly throughout much of my day. Truly worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ashclark_25

customer_reviews.title: works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...almost instantly relieves my elbow soreness from both weight training and light boxing. after just a few days of using this the pain is noticeably less and looks like it will clear up within a week or so of sustained use. I am applying it around 3-5 times per day and it goes on clean with no messy residue. great product!
customer_reviews.author: john d

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've had chronic low back pain for over a year, on and off. Sometimes when I go to bed it flares up, and I can't sleep. Now I just get up and rub some hempactiv on it and I'm fine all night. You can really feel it working. The scent doesn't bother me at all- it's a little like Vick's vaporub. Last night, after painting for 2 days, I had sharp pains in my shoulders and neck. This took care of it! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: PAIN RELIEF THAT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I received this product I put it on and wrapped my knee with a bandage cause I WAS IN SO MUCH PAIN! It worked immediately! I could hardly walk all day from the pain. I'm a 54 year old teacher and I have had a few injuries to my left knee. I even had shots to ease my pain. Working on my feet all day does not help! But this product WORKS! THANK GOD!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

product_meta.title: HEMPACTIV Hemp Pain Relief Cream | Hemp + MSM + Arnica + Menthol | Relieve Muscle, Joint & Arthritis Pain | Effective Hemp Pain Cream | 2oz
feature_bullets: HIGHLY ACTIVE: Hempactiv pain relieving cream helps your body heal naturally with clinically proven ingredients like hemp, MSM, arnica, and menthol.

SUPERIOR ABSORPTION: Absorbs quickly to provide targeted pain relief to your back, neck, knee, hip, shoulders, elbows, joints and muscles. Helps with skin conditions & supports the body’s natural healing processes.
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS: MSM, Arnica & Infused Pure Active Hemp Extract (no isolate) helps heal painful swelling.
FAST ACTING MENTHOL CREAM REDUCES CHRONIC PAIN – Rub thoroughly for 30 seconds for optimal absorption. Lowers swelling from inflamed atopic itchy rashes and bruises.
A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST – We proudly stand behind our products, and your satisfaction is our top priority.
